alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:54PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sublette and north central Sweetwater Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Farson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Sublette and north central Sweetwater Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains West
